short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close old, inactive & duplicate chrome tabs with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab cleaner lets you manage your chrome tabs enriching native tab search offered by the browser. 
1. Aggregating duplicate tabs -  These are the duplicate tabs open in you chrome, closing them will close all tabs duplicate except one.
2. Segregating tabs based on their age -  Lists all tabs grouped together by age in days
3. Holistic view of all open tabs- List of all tabs grouped by website.
4. Search & switch tab  

For better experience, please pin Tab Cleaner to your toolbar. One can do this by clicking on extensions icon on to right and click pin icon next to Tab Cleaner in the list.

Declutter your browser for a better surfing experience.
